CodeGenTemplate.title: Query Template for RETRIEVE with Paging
CodeGenTemplate.ifNewFile:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="${queryNamespace}">

ifNotFound.insert:
<select id="${selectPagedListQueryId}" resultType="${voClassPath}">{CodeGen:StartOfCDATA}
#foreach ($row in $table.columns)
#if ($velocityCount == 1)
    SELECT   T.${row.name}
#else
           , T.${row.name}
#end
#end
    FROM     ${table.tableName} T
    WHERE	 1 = 1 {CodeGen:EndOfCDATA}
#foreach ($row in $table.columns)
    <if test="${row.camelCased} != null and ${row.camelCased} != ''">{CodeGen:StartOfCDATA}
      AND	 T.${row.name} = #{${row.camelCased}}
    {CodeGen:EndOfCDATA}</if>
#end
    -- ORDER BY  Condition
</select>
